short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the FlipGive Max browser extension to activate cash back directly at your favorite websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Truly rewarding cashback shopping that gives back to your team.

Turn everyday shopping into reliable fundraising. FlipGive Max will remind you to activate cash back directly at your favorite stores whenever you shop online.

Get reminders when you search or visit participating stores online. Easily active the cashback offer with a single click!

Learn more about FlipGive at https://www.flipgive.com
